title: mari65
author: mari65
content: Can someone upload some gameplay of it in action?They decided to make him the invisible man for some reason grinch costume for adults. Doesn't seem like a wise choice since he's going to be whipping his limbs every which way. I'd rather be able to see them.It looks like he can take off his shawl and have his whole top half go MIA too.Maybe I just saw some bad screenshots. If anyone can put a video out there I'd appreciate it.
